div.div: Medical history of child: Please tick appropriately

div.label: Is your child allergic to any medicine/drugs?:
If yes, please indicate the name of the medicine/drug:
Is your child currently under medication/treatment:
If yes, please indicate the type and purpose:
A) I give consent to the School Nurse to give my child oral analgesic or any antipyretic drug (for pain and administer first aid, if needed):
B) I give my consent for emergency measure including hospital treatment to be initiated for my child incase an accident or sudden illness (including school planned excursions):
C) I give consent for the immunization for my child (applicable to children being admitted in Grade 1 and above):
